page.title: 11HOLYWELL FARM etc
page.content: {Holywell Farm } --------------- Holywell farm specialises in breeding cows.There are 60 acres of land,56 acres are used for grass and silage.They have 14 Herefords and 86 Fresians producing approx.30 calves a year.The herd produces 333 060 litres of milk with 4.2% butter fat. The farm built in 1900 only employs one man. {Ingle Hill Farm } ----------------- The farm was built in 1968 and its two main products are barley and wheat.The only animals on the farm are pigs.The farm has 210 acres of land and employs one man.They have many tractors including a Massey Ferguson and John Deer 2140 4wd..
